title: New York - poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 16.0 was reported at Year 2011, and 2013
Minimum Percentage of population about 13.1 was reached at Year 2000, and 2002
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Percentage of population, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 16.0 was reported at Year 2011, and 2013
